name: Toad-A-Licious
description:
~~~ We are working on a full fledged version of the game! Follow us for update and news! ~~~

Pick up your broom and your wand, it's toad soup time!

Ya old toad soup recipe:
-Use your wand to toadify some monsters
-Ditch the poor toads in the cauldron
-The cauldron will do the rest

Keyboard controls
move: arrows or WASD
shoot: Z or M
back: ESC
select: Enter

Gamepad controls
move: D-Pad or left thumbstick
shoot: A
back: Back
select: Start

Credits
ZappedCow: design, code, sfx
Bahototh: art
Markymark665: music
